direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query records related to user actions (subscription and redemption) with similar parameter structures.
Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameter checks and request handling logic.
Both methods access BLVT-related information but for different purposes (info vs. subscription record).

direct_enhancements.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods use the sendSignedRequest method for sending requests, making them substitutable in terms of request handling.

Subscribing to a BLVT should be tested before querying the subscription record to ensure the record exists.
